name: Ferretcoin
description: Ferret Coin ($FEC) traces its roots back to one of the earliest animal-themed memecoin ideas proposed on GitHub in 2013, making it a true pioneer of the meme economy. Revived by the community, Ferret Coin honors its playful beginnings while embracing modern crypto culture, blending nostalgia with innovation. With a strong meme identity and loyal supporters, it seeks to continue the original spirit of internet fun and decentralized creativity.
